text: Possibili scenari is the sixth studio album by Italian singer-songwriter Cesare Cremonini, released on November 24, 2017 by Trecuori. It topped the Italian album charts in the week of its release. On 7 December 2018 the album was reissued in piano and voice edition, in which the artist completely rewrote the arrangements of the original pieces with the solo piano. ==Track listing== # Possibili scenari – 5:11 # Kashmir-Kashmir – 4:09 # Poetica – 4:53 # Un uomo nuovo – 5:41 # Nessuno vuole essere Robin – 4:44 (Cesare Cremonini) # Silent Hill – 4:13 # Il cielo era sereno – 4:33 # La isla – 4:46 # Al tuo matrimonio – 4:25 # La macchina del tempo – 7:02 ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chart (2017) ! Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:2017 albums Category:Cesare Cremonini (musician) albums
title: Possibili scenari
